Simon Minter

CO-FOUNDER

With over 7 Billion views on the 6 channels he features on Simon has carved out a successful youtube career since December 2012. During this time, he has raised hundreds of thousands of pounds for charity. With this platform in mind and a philanthropic tendancy Simon, a.k.a Mintiminter, decided to start his own non-profit to help those who need in most in the education sector. With your help, he aims to change the lives of children all over the UK by providing them with memorable experiences that they may not otherwise have had the chance to have.

Nick Minter

CO-FOUNDER/DIRECTOR

After training as a teacher Nick wanted to use his expertise to help children through experiential learning. He saw first-hand the effect that one experience can have on a student and aims to bring this to as many students as possible. With the aim of increasing attainment, Nick helps schools find and run experiences that they can then base their curriculum around to really make it come alive.
